description: A packed breakfast crêpe with simple ingredients to leave you full until lunch.
name: Crêpe with Egg, Cheese, Mushroom & Onion Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 10 medium eggs, 2 for crepe, 8 for filling
1 medium red onion, peeled and finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine the milk, 2 eggs, salt and combine fully.
Incrementally add the flour to the mix so that the mixture doesn't become too heavy and stays a little runny.
Heat up a pan to a medium heat with a little butter and pour 1/8 of the mixture onto the pan (you should get 8 pancakes from this batter).
Tilt the pan around so that the batter fills the pan fully and fry for 2 minutes.
After 2 minutes, flip the crepe over and fry for 2 more minutes and set to one side.
Now fry the mushrooms and onions in the pan for 6 minutes turning regularly and then set to one side.
Crack the eggs into the pan and fry the eggs for 6 minutes until cooked fully.
Remove from the heat, add your toppings into the crepes and scatter the grated cheese on top.
